content:
bvdh opened Issue #342:

The extension to FHIRcast that describe its integration with SMART (https://fhircast.org/launch-scenarios/), does not have a formal status and version. This is an important element of the overall specification and should have both.

isaacvetter commented on Issue #342:

Hey @bvdh ,

I'd thought that all the SMART stuff was in the spec, in addition to the informative launch scenarios page. For example, a hub.url SMART launch parameter is described here: https://fhircast.org/specification/STU2/#session-discovery

Are you sure that we're missing stuff? If so, what?

Isaac

bvdh commented on Issue #342:

I mean the specifications elements in https://fhircast.org/launch-scenarios/
